Offering immense privacy, abundant space and extensive views encompassing the Dandenong Ranges, this light-filled 4 bedroom home occupies a significant allotment of 1717 sq m approx. in a no-through road near Warrien Reserve.
The deceptively large elevated home boasts a single-storey layout with high ceilings, comprising 4 robed bedrooms and a brand new bathroom featuring high quality fittings of frameless rain shower, vanity and bathtub. The formal living room enjoys an open fireplace with inbuilt wood box and floor-to-ceiling windows embracing the landscape, complementing an east facing tiled sunroom and separate carpeted family room. The main and second bedrooms capture morning sunrises, which also sneak into the front foyer through glass panels.
Adjoining a dining room with newly polished floors, the kitchen has been upgraded with a stainless steel Smeg gas/electric cooker and new floor and splashback tiles.
Freshly painted throughout, further highlights include: new gas ducted heating unit with timer, new carpets, curtains and light fixtures, along with all new switchboard, guttering and downpipes.
Seize this perfect opportunity to immerse yourself in a country lifestyle without sacrificing immediate convenience. Landscaping opportunities invite your own interpretation. Grow your own herbs and vegetables, plant a mini-orchard and perhaps transform the wood shed into a "poultry palace" for chickens. Tradespeople, mechanics, truck owners and home business operators will also appreciate the reinforced garage on a concrete slab, with its own electrical switchboard, water and telephone line and the opportunity to extend further access to the rear yard should the need arise.
Walk to a bus travelling between Chirnside Park Shopping Centre and Croydon station, nearby schools include Croydon Hills Primary School, Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar. Shops and amenities are close by at McAdam Square, Croydon North and Croydon.
- 0.42 acres in an esteemed cul-de-sac
- Renovated 4 bedroom home with extensive views
- Brand new bathroom and a new Smeg cooker
- 2 living areas and a sunroom
- Reinforced double garage with work area, power and water
- Nearby schools, bus and shops
